title: It’s Time to Fear the Deer | The Mismatch
description:
The Phoenix Suns fire head coach Igor Kokoskov, continuing a season of constant upheaval for the franchise (1:14), the Milwaukee Bucks look unstoppable as they complete their sweep of the Detroit Pistons (22:38), and the Utah Jazz pull off an impressive win against the Houston Rockets to avoid a sweep (33:36). Plus: as the first round comes to a close, the most interesting narratives for the remaining series (49:56).
Hosts: Chris Vernon, Kevin O’Connor

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
